70582.<center>偉大なる まもの使いの肖像\n<br>\nいかなる凶悪な魔物でも:
It's a portrait of a mighty Monster Master.
''One cannot be a true Monster Master without a heart that accepts even the most vicious of monsters''

75444.<center>最後まで 勇敢に戦った\n我が教え子たちよ……\nどうか 安らか:
<center>My pupils who fought heroically to the end...
May they rest in peace.

75445.アラハギーロ王国で 蝶を手に入れた。\n残り <%nEV_LUA_NUM_1>匹:
obtained the butterfly of Arahaghiro Kingdom.
Let's look for the other <%nEV_LUA_NUM_1> butterflies elsewhere.

75446.３匹の蝶が 集まった。\nこれで 三門の関所にある\nグランゼドーラへの門が 開:
The 3 Butterflies have been collected. With these,
the door to Gran Zedora at Three Way Gate should open.
Let's head for Three Way Gate!
